overview:
Philip Jenkins is an accomplished information security professional with over 11 years of security management, network, and system engineering experience, Philip also brings expertise in the Financial Services arena.

He was Vice President Enterprise Security Management at Friedman Billings Ramsey where he designed and implemented their information security program and infrastructure. He lead their Corporate Information Security Committee and managed all aspects of information and physical security program. Prior to FBR he provided both network and security integrity on production networks used for online credit card verification and processing services at Cyber Cash.

Philip is recognized as a leader in information security, active in the ISC, ISACA, and a nominee for Information Security Executive of the Year Mid-Atlantic 2006.
